mapper.select: SELECT attendance.id as attendanceId, team_id as teamId, seminar_id as seminarId, team_order as teamOrder, pre_file as ppt, report_name as report, pre_score as presentationScore, report_score as reportScore FROM attendance, klass_seminar WHERE klass_seminar.seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND klass_seminar.id = attendance.klass_seminar_id ORDER BY team_order
